attributes.action: My local pub will only let women in if i get enough women to petition.  Please Help me to do this by signing this.  Lets get rid of discrimination for good!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My petition is to get my local bar to allow women in.  

The bar here is for men only, they are in several different teams such as Pool, Darts, Dominoes etc. etc.  If a competitor comes to play a game of pool and are female they are instantly barred from entering the bar.

My petition is to allow females into the bar always.  This is unfair against all legal rights of females in the direct area.  If you don't know it is men only you get harassed if you walk in - shouted abuse at and much more.

Please sign this petition to stop discrimination against women completely!
